content: I’ve been a longtime user of notebooks. They never crash, they never require upgrades. However, I like to have some fun. I use a fountain pen. I like the feel of the pen on the paper. I’ve posted some images of my notebook. I number the pages, create a table of contents, and a quick and dirty thematic index. I number the pages This is my table of contents on the inside cover of the notebook. Sometimes this spills over to the next page (see below). Poor man’s thematic index
